Text:
BE WARNED: There no English, Spanish or Italian subs at all.

So if you can't understand Italian or Spanish, too bad.
sgnukie subs english, spanish & italian ARE INCLUDED

alguien sabe si esta version esta editado o si es la version completa de 105 minutos.

Anyone know if this version is edited or is the original complete 105 minute movie.

And yes I realize the description says 100 min , just wondering.
egroj: it should be the original, only played at 25fps (because it's a PAL DVD). The original film is shot at 24fps. 105/(25/24) = 100.

Sorry people, this is the cut version!

I just saw it: 88min. and not a second more!

Thanks, 
the subs are working for me after burning a disc and playing it with PowerDVD 7, 8 and 9.
can somebody write what audio  and subs languages is included?>

Audio: Spanish, Italian.
Subs: English, Spanish, Italian.

Thanks, great upload.
